question_text: Which two characteristics are typical of RS232 serial connections? (Select two)
answer_options: Use of differential pairs for high-speed data
Voltage-based signaling on a single wire per direction
Requirement of a console or terminal emulator for configuration
Multi-gigabit data rates and reversible connectors
correct_answer: Voltage-based signaling on a single wire per direction
Requirement of a console or terminal emulator for configuration
explanation: RS232 uses one wire per signal direction with voltage-based signaling and often requires terminal software to access devices like routers.
